summary: Fully rebuilt, fully standalone, multiple options. Contains Adult Content, NSFW
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][COLOR=#c00000][SIZE=4][B][I][U]Warning: This mod features adult content[/U][/I][/B][/SIZE][/COLOR][/FONT].[/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][SIZE=6]

[CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#c00000][B][I][U]Update 3-27:[/U][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#c00000][B][I][U]
[/U][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][COLOR=#c00000][B][I][U]Added a "Beta Version" of the mesh for use with [/U][/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][B][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][I][U]"Schlongs of Skyrim" mod.[/U][/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/B][B][COLOR=#c00000][FONT=Palatino Linotype][SIZE=4][I][U] [/U][/I][/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/B][/CENTER]

[COLOR=#d8d8d8]Enhanced Fat Bastard Body Replacer[/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#d8d8d8]
[/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#d8d8d8]
[/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8]This mod is a revision of my earlier mod [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51308/?]"Fat Bastard Male Body Replacer[/URL]". More than [/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8]
[/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8]just an update, the mod has been rebuilt, and redesigned from the ground up. Now a [/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8]
[/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8]fully standalone mod, no other mods or files required. [/COLOR][/SIZE][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]This will alter the apperance of [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]your male Player Character only, will not alter NPCs, and will not change your female [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Player Characters custom apperances, as the previous version did. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Now features a fully [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]immersive start, from the momment character creation appears, your character will be a [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]fat bastard, custom prisoner clothes included. Also you will find custom "Plus Sized [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Armors" in the keep, that have been converted to fit your new body type. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Just as in vanillia Skyrim, you will find: [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Stormcloak Armor [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Light Imperial Armor [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Heavy Imperial Armor [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Mage Robes. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]This armors have exact same stats as the default counterparts. Armors [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]have been placed in plain sight, you can't miss them (see pics). Only armors which have [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]been converted to Fat Bastard Body Type will be compatible with your new apperance. I [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]recommend installing [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52215/?]"Welcome to Fat Bastards"[/URL] this mod adds a new a merchant which [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]sells converted armors (please see mod page for full list).[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]The mesh has been rebuilt to offer a more natural appernance (not just a big belly). [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]The seam issues have also be fixed, so no more breaks along the waist. Mesh now features [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]custom textures by Sundracon. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Mod also now includeds mutliple mesh options:[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]"Semi" Work Safe (body is covered by lioncloth, by body parts are visable under)[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]NSFW (fully nude male body)[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]NSFW_Adult (fully nude erect male, for use in Adult mods) this has been tested, and [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]actually works well with most animations, during some animations clipping occurs. [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]
[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]Please leave feedback in comments section, post any bugs or incompatabilites, Endorse [/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#d8d8d8][B][I]if you enjoy the mod.[/I][/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#d8d8d8]
[/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]Notes:[/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]This mod is not compatible with [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13712/?]Unique Character by roberto400 [/URL]even though the last [/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]version required it (as I said total rebuild). [/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]
[/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]If you use Unique Character, I recommend you stick with the earlier mod [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51308/?]"Fat Bastard Male Body Replacer"[/URL] [/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]as it features fully compatability, and will be updated with the new features of this mod. [/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]
[/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]This mod contains assets from [URL=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3421/?]"Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male"[/URL] by [/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][B][I][COLOR=#c00000]Sundracon, used with premission, Big Thanks to Sundracon for this.[/COLOR][/I][/B][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#c00000]
[/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=4][COLOR=#c00000][B]Mod requires Dawnguard DLC[/B][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]
author: Foster
